title: Single Of The Week: Come On Gang! – Fortune Favours The Brave
content:
For this weeks SOTW we have a fantastic slice of twee pop from Edinburgh post punk outfit Come On Gang! Landing somewhere between The Cribs and Los Campesinos!, their energetic new single Fortune Favours The Brave is released later this week (10th September) as a free download. Featuring an uplifting chorus sure to make feet dance; the lyrical content is very much focused on the trials and tribulations of being an angst filled teenager. “If this is being young, it isn’t easy” laments lead singer and drummer Sarah, her voice containing venomous understanding. With the band gearing up for an expansive UK tour, make sure to check them out at their upcoming live dates!

Check Out Come On Gang!’s Myspace!

Download Fortune Favours The Brave! (From 10th September)

author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
